duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute a sales plan to achieve revenue goals in California and oversee local sales reps in regions across the country.
Build and maintain relationships with key accounts.
Identify and close new business opportunities.
Oversee the performance of local sales reps and provide training and development to sales reps.
Track and analyze sales data and stay up-to-date on industry trends.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field (Master's preferred)
